title: yahoo 下載過往股價落excel 停左

replies.msg:
yahoo 下載過往股價落excel 停左
有咩其他方法下載落excel?

下 我尋晚仲有

yahoo 下載過往股價落excel 停左
有咩其他方法下載落excel?

下 我尋晚仲有

ichant 仲有?

網站有, API (ichart)停左

我用python script call browser(chrome) 再download

#python
import webbrowser

crumb = 自己用chrome去個個頁搵個url
period1 = datetime.datetime(1980,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')
period2 = datetime.datetime(2020,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')


url = 'http://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v7/finance/download/' + ticker + '?period1=' + period1 + '&period2=' + period2 + '&interval=1d&events=history&crumb=' + crumb

webbrowser.get(using='google-chrome').open(url,new=2) #new=2 open in new tab

#python
import webbrowser

crumb = 自己用chrome去個個頁搵個url
period1 = datetime.datetime(1980,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')
period2 = datetime.datetime(2020,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')


url = 'http://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v7/finance/download/' + ticker + '?period1=' + period1 + '&period2=' + period2 + '&interval=1d&events=history&crumb=' + crumb

webbrowser.get(using='google-chrome').open(url,new=2) #new=2 open in new tab

則係用唔到vba download?

crumb = 自己用chrome去個個頁搵個url
period1 = datetime.datetime(1980,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')
period2 = datetime.datetime(2020,01,01,0,0).strftime('%s')
